title: 273-Robin Hood: The Good Thief
itunes:title: 273-Robin Hood: The Good Thief
description:
You would think, if you're the most wanted person in Britain, you would probably want to lie low for a little while and think that the all-too-happy-to-get-kidnapped abbot with the big bags of gold strolling through Sherwood forest might be an obvious trap.

The creature is why you don't want to eat a big meal and then go into battle.

--

Links!

Scoundrel! Check out the story of Sarah Wilson: https://myths.link/scoundrel

Our membership! It still exists! https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership
